short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PhilanthroFeed supplements posts on your newsfeed with information on non-profit organizations that could use your support.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the current political climate, many non-profit organizations need more support than ever before. PhilanthroFeed helps bring awareness to many of these organizations by placing donation and support information into your news feed, right above politically charged posts. Making many, small donations can make a big impact in the world, and a small impact on your wallet.
DISCLAIMER: PhilanthroFeed's tagging algorithm is still under development - it may add to posts it shouldnâ€™t or miss relevant posts. PhilanthroFeed is improving every day. We apologize any inconveniences this might cause.
